health_data_information_systems_summary: The Committee discussed audit queries and responses related to Nakuru Water and Sanitation Company's financial statements, non-revenue water, internal controls, asset transfer, and meter replacements to improve efficiency and reduce revenue losses.
health_data_challenges: Challenges identified included high non-revenue water, lack of internal controls leading to financial losses, delayed tabling of reports, inadequate resources for committee work, and delayed asset transfer from Central Rift Valley Water Works Agency.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Recommendations included calibrating production meters, replacing faulty customer meters, identifying illegal water users, transferring assets, seeking funding for infrastructure upgrades, updating assets register, and improving water billing accuracy.
